meanings.definition: Brought about or caused by something else
meanings.sent1: The superinduced changes in the weather were unexpected.
meanings.sent2: Her superinduced happiness was evident in her smile.
meanings.sent3: The superinduced laughter from the silly joke filled the room.
meanings.sent4: His superinduced fear of spiders made him jump at the sight of a tiny one.
meanings.sent5: The superinduced excitement before the concert was contagious.

meanings.definition: Added on top of something else
meanings.sent1: The superinduced decorations made the cake look even more beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The superinduced layer of frosting added extra sweetness to the dessert.
meanings.sent3: The superinduced toppings on the pizza made it a delicious mess to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her superinduced accessories completed her outfit perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The superinduced layer of snow on the mountain sparkled in the sunlight.
